Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor

::Serpentor cursed as laser fire dug into him, throwing his plasma launcher 
at a re-aiming Nemesis::



_::Nemesis Enforcer cursed, the robot pulling the trigger to his missile 
launcher, a missile heading for the area between FZ and DevilDuer::

----
::Serpentor pulled out his sword, yellling in pain, throwing the sword at 
Zardus' chest, then tackling Nemesis, punching him in the face a few times::
